The total investment is $80{,}000 + $50{,}000 = $130{,}000.  
After the repairs the value increased by 150 %, i.e. it became 2.5 × the original price:

\[
\text{New value} = 80{,}000 \times 2.5 = 200{,}000.
\]

Selling at that price gives a profit of

\[
200{,}000 - 130{,}000 = 70{,}000.
\]

#### 70000
